card.name: CW - GCCW182 - Missing pages on verification

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth 
Honestly cant see how we are going to able to fix this issue if users just put the problem cases on hold and continue.

Until we don't get the opportunity to actually take a look at the problem when it happens we might as well archive this ticket.

We will handle it as extremely urgent if we can have the opportunity to gather all the information we require if it happens again.
